oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design and synthesis of novel propellanes by using Claisen rearrangement and ring-closing metathesis as the key steps
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
DIPAK, MK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: olefin-metathesis
catalysts
heterocycles
cage compounds
claisen rearrangement
metathesis
polycycles
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Novel hexacyclic caged compounds are prepared by a combination of Claisen rearrangement and ring-closing metathesis (RCM). Additionally, a Grignard reaction in conjugation with RCM produced intricate hexacyclic caged molecules.
